name: There Won't be Light
description:
There Won't be Light is a horror experience focused on the player's interaction with the environment. Through cooperation with other players, escape the scenario by solving the present puzzles, and don't let the imposters stop your escape.

  • Purge: In a co-op experience of up to 5 players, escape the scene while the one lurking in the shadows hunts you down.
  • Possessed: In a competitive 4-player experience, complete the challenges and discover who owns it, who must eliminate humans.
  • Tools: Your voice is your salvation and your damnation. While in silence, There Won't be Light will provide silent tools to communicate with other players. Use them creatively and wisely.
  • Maps: Temples, houses, snowstorms... Different experiences in scenarios with different characteristics and possibilities.
